snippet: Louise Neathway was arraigned in Manhattan Criminal Court on charges of grand larceny, aggravated harassment and of stalking Brian Cashman, the Yankees’ general manager.
abstract: Manhattan woman Louise Neathway is arraigned on charges of grand larceny, aggravated harassment and stalking New York Yankees general manager Brian Cashman; Neathway is accused of extorting $6,000 from Cashman for a medical procedure, threatening to reveal embarrassing information to the news media if he did not comply.

byline.original: By DAVID WALDSTEIN and RUSS BUETTNER

lead_paragraph: Louise Neathway was arraigned in Manhattan Criminal Court on charges of grand larceny, aggravated harassment and of stalking Brian Cashman, the Yankees’ general manager.

headline.seo: Woman Is Accused of Stalking Yankees’ Cashman
headline.main: Woman Is Accused of Stalking Yankees’ Cashman
headline.print_headline: Woman Is Accused of Stalking Yanks’ Cashman
